name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with expertise in **Vue.js**, **React**, and **GraphQL** for crafting dynamic and responsive user interfaces. Demonstrated proficiency in **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, alongside strong capabilities in **Automated Testing**, **CI/CD**, and **Performance Optimization**. Experienced in implementing accessibility standards and responsive designs, ensuring user-centric applications that perform efficiently. Skilled in microservice architectures and utilizing cloud services effectively. Proven track record in driving project success through leadership, collaboration, and project management, while maintaining a commitment to clean and efficient code across diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged expertise in **React** and **JavaScript** to enhance UI/UX for the pathway builder, achieving a **30%** reduction in completion time.
Implemented **GraphQL** for efficient data retrieval, optimizing performance and speeding up frontend interactions by **40%**.
Applied **CI/CD** techniques integrating **Git** and **GitHub Actions**, which led to a **80%** reduction in deployment times.
Executed automated testing frameworks to ensure software reliability and adherence to accessibility standards, improving overall product quality.
Utilized **Microservice Architectures** to design scalable frontend solutions, enhancing modularity and maintainability across the codebase.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time, fostering a culture of leadership and collaboration.
Championed best practices in responsive design, ensuring applications are fully accessible on various devices while maintaining performance.
Contributed to the development of a performance optimization strategy utilizing tools and methods that increased application efficiency by over **30%**.

• Developed scalable and optimized frontend applications using **Vue.js**, enhancing user experience and responsiveness with a performance increase of 20%.
• Collaborated with backend engineers to create a robust API using **GraphQL** that improved data retrieval efficiency by 30%.
• Implemented automated testing strategies utilizing **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving a 95% test coverage rate.
• Led CI/CD pipeline development with **Git**, ensuring seamless integration and delivery across platforms, reducing deployment times by 40%.
• Ensured compliance with **Accessibility Standards** and best practices in **Responsive Design**, resulting in a 15% increase in user engagement.
• Managed project timelines and deliverables effectively through agile methodologies, achieving 100% on-time delivery for 12 major releases.
• Spearheaded an initiative to adopt **Microservice Architectures**, contributing to a 35% decrease in system downtime.
• Fostered collaboration among team members using tools like **Slack** and **Trello**, enhancing productivity in a remote work setting.

Developed responsive and accessible web applications utilizing **Vue.js** and **React**, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards.
Implemented **GraphQL** for efficient data fetching, leading to an improvement in performance optimization by **30%**.
Utilized **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS** to enhance UI/UX, contributing to a **40%** increase in overall application load times.
Applied automated testing practices with **Git**, improving collaboration and reducing cycle time in project management by **25%**.
Executed CI/CD pipelines for seamless integration and deployment, maximizing team productivity in a remote work environment.
Led a team of developers, fostering collaboration and effective communication, which boosted team performance.
Adhered to microservice architectures ensuring scalable solutions for multiple projects.
